entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the morning. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
